snippet: American Pharoah, last year’s 2-year-old champion, made his return to the track appear easy, winning the Rebel Stakes in Hot Springs, Ark., by six and a quarter lengths.
abstract: American Pharoah wins Rebel Stakes in Arkansas by six and a quarter lengths.
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, last year’s 2-year-old champion, made his return to the track appear easy, winning the Rebel Stakes in Hot Springs, Ark., by six and a quarter lengths.

headline.main: American Pharoah Wins in Hot Springs
headline.print_headline: American Pharoah Wins in Hot Springs
